[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [InsertionMarkerPreviewer](./blockly.insertionmarkerpreviewer_class.md) &gt; [previewReplacement](./blockly.insertionmarkerpreviewer_class.previewreplacement_1_method.md)

## InsertionMarkerPreviewer.previewReplacement() method

Display a connection preview where the draggedCon connects to the staticCon, replacing the replacedBlock (currently connected to the staticCon).

**Signature:**

```typescript
previewReplacement(draggedConn: RenderedConnection, staticConn: RenderedConnection, replacedBlock: BlockSvg): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  draggedConn | RenderedConnection | The connection on the block stack being dragged. |
|  staticConn | RenderedConnection | The connection not being dragged that we are connecting to. |
|  replacedBlock | [BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg_class.md) | The block currently connected to the staticCon that is being replaced. |

**Returns:**

void
